homePageRedesign.primaryheader: Unlock a new top revenue channel.
homePageRedesign.description: Wunderkind is a global performance marketing solution powered by AI, data, and identity that helps brands acquire and retain customers via owned channels at unprecedented scale.
homePageRedesign.secondaryheaderrevenuepage: There's a more efficient way to connect with your customers & drive revenue.
homePageRedesign.carddescriptionrevenuepage: more of your website traffic without relying on cookies, Wunderkind can unlock a new top revenue channel for you. We’ll scale your highest-converting, one-to-one marketing messages through emails, text messages, and ads.
homePageRedesign.carddescriptionrevenuepage2: of total digital revenue for your company, often at a higher return than your other performance marketing channels.
homePageRedesign.secondaryheaderbrandspage: See how we’re helping over 700 brands crush their digital revenue goals with one-to-one marketing.
homePageRedesign.cookiepageheader: With traditional paid marketing channels delivering less & asking for more, marketers are breaking up with the old growth model.
homePageRedesign.cookiepagesmalldescription2: Increase in paid media spend needed to match last year’s performance
homePageRedesign.cookiepagesmalldescription3: Of media for retail and CPG industries are driven by cookie-based ad tactics
homePageRedesign.cookiepagebottomheader: Many are investing in a new revenue channel that can drive sustainable growth and efficiency in the new era of performance marketing.
homePageRedesign.weunderstandpageheader: We Understand you have a lot on your plate
homePageRedesign.weunderstandpageheadercontinued: you have a lot on your plate
homePageRedesign.weunderstandpagesmalldescription: You need to grow your business, manage your budget, and create meaningful relationships with your customers that last — but the channels that worked yesterday aren’t delivering the same results.
homePageRedesign.resultspagedescriptionheader: We help marketers acquire new customers at scale and keep them loyal for life. Best of all, no heavy lifting is required from your team.
homePageRedesign.resultspageheader: See the results we’re driving for our clients today.
homePageRedesign.resultspagesmalldescription: Standard share of digital revenue across one-to-one email and text messaging
homePageRedesign.resultspagesmalldescription2: Improvement in list growth rates across channels
homePageRedesign.resultspageheader2: Don’t just take our word for it.
homePageRedesign.resultspagesmallparagraphdescription: We rank as a top paid channel for hundreds of clients in their own analytics platforms, regularly outperforming other paid retargeting channels like Google and Meta in scale and return on investment.
homePageRedesign.performancepageheader: Dive head first into performance marketing with Wunderkind.
homePageRedesign.performancepagecardheader: The Power of Performance Marketing in 2024
homePageRedesign.performancepagecardheader2: Here’s What Happened Over Black Friday And Cyber Monday
homePageRedesign.performancepagecardheader3: Brands Turn to "Brandformance" for Results in 2024
homePageRedesign.performancepagecardheader4: How To Navigate the AI Landscape to Drive Performance
homePageRedesign.performancepagecarddescription: The guide to solutions for incorporating identity networks for cost-effective audience growth, how to rely on owned channels and AI to strengthen customer relationships, delivering personalized experiences at scale without using third party cookie trackers, and more.
homePageRedesign.performancepagecarddescription2: When it comes to driving revenue for brands, Black Friday and Cyber Monday (BFCM) have always been the biggest events of the year. This probably won’t change anytime soon, but the nuances of how and when consumers transact has evolved over the years and tells an interesting story for retailers. Let’s dig into some ‘hot off the press’, high-level stats.
homePageRedesign.performancepagecarddescription3: Today's B2C marketing executives need a more efficient way to connect with their customers and drive increased revenue necessary for profitable growth. In this new webinar, we explore the CMO State of the Union and investigate the biggest challenges and opportunities for brands heading into 2024.
homePageRedesign.performancepagecarddescription4: With AI on the rise since the release of OpenAI’s chatbot, ChatGPT, marketing leaders are left with questions regarding the use case for AI. While AI promises  increased efficiency and higher revenue, it can be difficult determining which AI models to leverage and which tech partner will actually move the needle.
homePageRedesign.paidchannelpageheader: Add a new paid channel to your mix and get more revenue from your owned channels today.

seo.metaDesc: Wunderkind is a global performance marketing solution that helps brands acquire new customers at scale and keep them loyal for life. Unlock a new revenue channel today.
